EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/DSC Student Success Webinar_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal and Data Science Central on November 17
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://event.on24.com/eventRegistration/EventLobbyServlet?target=reg20.jsp&partnerref=Pivotal&eventid=1080873&sessionid=1&key=494EF9E67799B2760FF98F34F3B960EA&regTag=&sourcepage=register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=DSC-11-17> Tuesday, November 17, 2015
9AM, PST REGISTER <https://event.on24.com/eventRegistration/EventLobbyServlet?target=reg20.jsp&partnerref=Pivotal&eventid=1080873&sessionid=1&key=494EF9E67799B2760FF98F34F3B960EA&regTag=&sourcepage=register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=DSC-11-17> Educational institutions have a wealth of information, which can be brought together in an institutional data lake to predict and influence student behavior. In this webinar <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1080873/494EF9E67799B2760FF98F34F3B960EA?partnerref=Pivotal>, two Pivotal data scientists will discuss a recent collaborative project with a top university, in which many data sources were used to build a 360-degree profile of student activity on campus and help predict student success.
Join us <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1080873/494EF9E67799B2760FF98F34F3B960EA?partnerref=Pivotal> on November 17 to learn about the data science pipelines that Pivotal developed and how they are now being used to predict student metrics (such as GPA, course grade and time to graduate), and even as intervention tools to help prevent students from dropping out.
